children.value: We are thrilled to announce that we partnered with a leading crypto exchange
to integrate Hummingbot‚Äôs trading capabilities and bring liquidity mining to the exchange!

Crypto.com was founded in 2016 on a simple belief: it‚Äôs a basic human right for everyone to control their money, data, and identity. Crypto.com serves over 3 million customers today, providing them with a powerful alternative to traditional financial services through the Crypto.com App, the Crypto.com Card, and the Crypto.com Exchange.
Read more in our blog post:
Hummingbot Partners with Crypto.com Exchange for High-Frequency Trading and Liquidity Mining
on how to use the connector.
As Bittrex announced in a recent
, their API v3 is now live. According to Bittrex
the old API v1.1 will be deprecated by September 30, 2020.
In line with this change, we updated our Bittrex connector to make it compatible with v3 API and unit test cases.
In the ongoing effort to make the Hummingbot code base more developer-friendly, we refactored several parts of the exchange connector code to make it easier to add additional exchanges in the future:

if your connector doesn't provide account balance
update via web socket API, you will also need to set
Moved exchange connectors to a new location:
Formalize trading pair format, except within the connector module, all trading pairs are in BASE-QUOTE format.
Fixed bug where some orders are not created due to broken account balance update
Fixed inconsistent adjusted order amount with inventory skew
Fixed API requests intermittently failing on Kraken connector
We want to thank üôè community member
Fixed bug with Liquid connector incorrectly integrating web socket for user data stream
Added DAI to trading pair splitter to address an issue where DAI trading pairs are not showing in Binance connector
